title: Understanding Salt Types
text: To classify a salt as acidic, basic, or neutral, consider the strength of the acid and base from which it is derived. A neutral salt comes from a strong acid and a strong base.

title: Identify the Components
text: NaCl is formed from NaOH (a strong base) and HCl (a strong acid). What does this imply about the nature of NaCl?

title: Classify NaCl
text: Given that NaCl is derived from a strong acid and a strong base, what type of salt is it?
